meanings.sent1: She remained unshaken during the storm, showing her calm demeanor.
meanings.sent2: The unshaken tree stood tall in the face of strong winds.
meanings.sent3: The unshaken cup of coffee didn't spill even when the table shook.
meanings.sent4: His unshaken belief in himself helped him overcome all obstacles.
meanings.sent5: The unshaken mountain seemed to defy the raging storm.

meanings.sent1: The unshaken bridge held strong even under heavy traffic.
meanings.sent2: Her unshaken grip on the rope prevented her from falling.
meanings.sent3: The unshaken toy soldier never wavered in battle.
meanings.sent4: His unshaken resolve to succeed kept him going through tough times.
meanings.sent5: The unshaken foundation of the building ensured its stability.

meanings.sent1: The unshaken routine of morning walks kept him healthy.
meanings.sent2: Her unshaken loyalty to her friends never faltered.
meanings.sent3: The unshaken clock always showed the correct time.
meanings.sent4: His unshaken commitment to his goals inspired others.
meanings.sent5: The unshaken stars twinkled brightly in the night sky.
